After that operation, the two realized that nothing could stop them from having an even more interesting sex life. Not being a fan of monogamy, they decided to try with a third person. The two thought of using the services of a dominatrix. A person who can understand their needs and satisfy their individual desires. This story contains soft and hardcore scenes of BDSM. Play the game to live the fantasy along the three characters.
